sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: The smile, the charm, the words, the spark
Everything, you had it
I guess I had a naive heart
'Cause boy I let you have it
You said I was your only
I never thought you'd leave me lonely

sections.name: Pré refrain!+ 1 F#
lyrics: You're just a lost boy, with your head up in the clouds
You're just a lost boy, never keep your feet on the ground

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: Always gonna fly away, just because you know you can
You're never gonna learn there's no such place as a Neverland
You don't understand
You'll never grow up
You're never gonna be a man
Peter Pan

sections.name: Instru
lyrics: ***Instru***

sections.name: Couplet
lyrics: Deep down, I knew that you were too good to be true
But every piece and part of me wanted to believe in you
But now it's happily ever never
I guess now I know better

sections.name: Pré refrain
lyrics: You're just a lost boy, with your head up in the clouds
You're just a lost boy, never keep your feet on the ground

sections.name: Refrain
lyrics: Always gonna fly away, just because you know you can
You're never gonna learn there's no such place as a Neverland
You don't understand
You'll never grow up

sections.name: Solo
lyrics: ***Solo***

sections.name: Pré refrain!calme, + 1 F#
lyrics: You're just a lost boy, yeah, I know who you are
And you don't know what you lost, boy
Too busy chasing stars

sections.name: Refrain!2 last x2
lyrics: And you're always gonna fly away, just because you know you can
You're never gonna learn there's no such place as a Neverland
You don't understand
You'll never grow up (oh, you'll never grow up)
You're never gonna be a man
You'll never grow up
Yeah, you're never gonna be a man
Peter Pan

sections.name: Outro!Solo
lyrics: Never gonna be a man
